name: ConnectLifeWineClimateCabinet
0:
”Alexa, open Connect Life wine cabinet.”
”Alexa, ask Connect Life Wine Cabinet what is the temperature in upper zone.”
”Alexa, ask Connect Life Wine Cabinet what is the humidity in lower zone.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: connect life wine cabinet
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Meet the ConnectLife. SmartLiving IoT platform that connects people, appliances, and services from all Hisense group brands to simplify user's life. With the ConnectLife skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your ConnectLife enabled wine climate cabinet by voice. Alexa can help you set the temperature of each zones, check the humidity or adjust the lights according to your mood. She can even tell you how many bottles of wine are stored in your wine climate cabinet, which are ready for serve in the serving tray and if the storage conditions are as they should be.

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your skill name/company name account and discover your devices. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. They are shown in the ConnectLife app and can be changed.

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:

"Alexa, ask Connect Life Wine Cabinet what is the temperature in upper zone." 
"Alexa, ask Connect Life Wine Cabinet to set temperature in middle zone to 25 degrees Celsius" 
"Alexa, ask Connect Life Wine Cabinet what is the humidity in lower zone." 
"Alexa, ask Connect Life Wine Cabinet how many bottles do I have.” 
"Alexa, ask Connect Life Wine Cabinet what is the oldest wine." 
"Alexa, ask Connect Life Wine Cabinet to dim the lights to 50%." 
"Alexa, ask Connect Life Wine Cabinet to set the light to blue." 
"Alexa, ask Connect Life Wine Cabinet if my lights are turned off."
